resources.string: Welcome to Disc Jockey! To create a scorecard fill out the information below then hit "create"
Let\'s find your course! Select users and enter name of course to get started
To add a player, enter name below then hit add button.
To remove a player, enter name below the hit remove button. Note: this action cannot be undone.

I am a Junior in the major of CS at UT at Austin.
This is my first semester coding for andorid.
I interned last summer at IGT to create a unit test framework.
This summer I am going to be interning at Epic to create a new iOS app for the apple TV.
You can find my github here:\nhttps://github.com/RobertHale
For an questions, comments, or concerns email me here:\nrthspike@gmail.com
